DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE To develop , implement , evaluate effectiveness program design assist community Ob/Gyns vaccinate adolescent adult woman vaccine-preventable disease . SPECIFIC AIMS 1 . Determine feasibility implement successful vaccination program adolescent adult woman Ob/Gyn office direct assessment medical personnel & office staff : - Attitudes towards vaccination woman preventable disease - Perceived barrier implement program vaccinate woman office - Ideas overcome barrier successful program implementation - Current vaccination practice office-specific administrative process 2 . Design & implement program Ob/Gyns vaccinate woman human papillomavirus , influenza , & pertussis 3 . Determine effectiveness vaccination program base - Pre- post-program vaccination rate - Program satisfaction amongst Ob/Gyn provider office staff - Willingness continue possibly extend program additional vaccine 4 . Quantify level support resource need develop implement vaccination program
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Vaccination Program Community Ob/Gyn Setting
